alert.note: Alert for Butler; Greenwood; Kingman; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 12 at 10:26AM CST until January 13 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Butler, Greenwood, Kingman and Sedgwick Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Saturday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from Saturday evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
